Lines: Seattle is where Garma Zabi died in battle...
I heard its in complete ruin after Colony Drop
and repeated bombing.
Well, that's a great place for enemy troops to hide out.
Or maybe it's the work of ghosts wandering the battlefield...?
Booooooooo!!!!
Ghosts...?ã€€There can't be such a thing
in this cosmic century, can there?
I've been hearing that a lot since war started, you know?
Stories of ghosts... Empty MS suddenly falling over...
...Alone in a dark cockpit, suddenly strangled from behind...
Eeeeeek!
Klaus, you don't believe that story, do you?
T-t-this is ridiculous! It's an unscientific delusion!
So, so, so, that can't be true.
Ha, ha, ha, ha...
I am more afraid of flesh and blood.
F-fool! A ghost that is immune to physical attacks is
a unique and terrifying existence for an ordinary
genius like me who has no spiritual abilities!
Oh my...
Klaus has always been bad at this kind of talk...
However, work is work.
Let's go, partner!
Roger that!
